SEARCH
Package edu.rpi.legup.model

Class PuzzleExporter

java.lang.Object
edu.rpi.legup.model.PuzzleExporter
Direct Known Subclasses:
BattleshipExporter, BinaryExporter, FillapixExporter, HeyawakeExporter, LightUpExporter, MasyuExporter, MinesweeperExporter, NurikabeExporter, ShortTruthTableExporter, SkyscrapersExporter, StarBattleExporter, SudokuExporter, ThermometerExporter, TreeTentExporter
public abstract class PuzzleExporter extends Object
Abstract class for exporting puzzle data to XML format. This class provides functionality to export a puzzle object, including its board and tree structure, to an XML file. Subclasses must implement methods to create specific elements for the board and the tree.

  • Method Details

    • obfHash

      public static int obfHash(boolean solved, String date)
      Takes the puzzle state and the current date/time to obfuscate the solved state with an onto function to prevent cheating
      Parameters:
      solved - the solved state of the board, true if solved
      date - the current date and time, passed during export
      Returns:
      hash value of time and solved state

    • inverseHash

      public static Boolean inverseHash(int hash, String date)
      Deobfuscates the solved state of the board from hash value using the time provided in the puzzle xml-style export
      Parameters:
      hash - the hash value saved to the export
      date - the date/time value saved to the export
      Returns:
      boolean value of the solved state of the board

    • exportPuzzle

      public void exportPuzzle(String fileName) throws ExportFileException
      Exports the puzzle to an xml formatted file
      Parameters:
      fileName - name of file to be exported
      Throws:
      ExportFileException - if puzzle can not be exported

    • createBoardElement

      protected abstract Element createBoardElement(Document newDocument)
      Creates an XML element representing the board of the puzzle. Subclasses must implement this method to provide the XML structure for the board.
      Parameters:
      newDocument - The XML document to create elements within.
      Returns:
      An XML element representing the puzzle's board.

    • createProofElement

      protected Element createProofElement(Document newDocument)
      Creates an XML element representing the proof of the puzzle, including its tree structure. This method is used to generate the proof section of the XML, which contains the tree representation.
      Parameters:
      newDocument - The XML document to create elements within.
      Returns:
      An XML element representing the proof of the puzzle.

    • createTreeElement

      protected Element createTreeElement(Document newDocument)
      Creates an XML element representing the tree structure of the puzzle. This method traverses the tree nodes and transitions, and creates XML elements for each.
      Parameters:
      newDocument - The XML document to create elements within.
      Returns:
      An XML element representing the puzzle's tree structure.
